#summary Installation Instructions
#labels Type-Documentation

 # Download the latest version of the template, currently 0.1: http://coredatalibrary.googlecode.com/files/CoreDataLibrary%200.1.zip
 # Extract the archive.
 # Drag the `CoreDataLibrary Application` folder onto the `Drag Folder Here to Install` icon.
   * This step will copy the `CoreDataLibrary Application` to `/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/Library/Xcode/Project Templates/Application/`.  If XCode is installed in a different location, manually copy the folder to that location.
   * http://imgur.com/5eI4H.png
 # When you create a new project from within XCode you will see the `CoreDataLibrary Application` template.
